intro: This ruined Earth sees movement once more?! In the midst of waves of robots waking once more, the zombies' solo struggle begins in this action roguelike!
description:
[ Story ]
In this world ruined by the unstoppable forces of climate change, the senseless, emotionless zombies roam without purpose—until one day.

Combat robots, long since deactivated, somehow become operational, and the zombies are forced to flee from their indiscriminate attacks.

In the midst of fighting, fleeing, and broken robot parts, something long dormant awakens in the hearts of the zombies...

[ Gameplay ]
Zombie Blitz is a quarter-view survival roguelike bullet hell. With all its cool action rendered in adorable 3D graphics, it embodies the dynamic battles and fight for survival between the zombies roaming the world after the fall of humankind and the ruthless combat robots.

[ Features ]
- Refreshing action with easy-to-use controls!
Overwhelming waves of robots press in on all sides! As you start relatively vulnerable, understanding enemy numbers, positions, and wave duration is key to controlling the map. Make use of your trouble-free auto-targeting system and stay on the move to collect coins on the map for upgrading various skills that increase firepower!

- Survive persistent waves with your personalized build!
Freely combine characters, skills, and even items! Will you be aggressive by strengthening firepower and attack speed or prioritize survival by increasing movement speed and HP? Find your favorite amongst dozens of build combinations to wipe out your enemies!

- Together once more! Cooperate with a partner to blitz in!
Zombie Blitz features 2-player co-op! Overcome the waves of combat robots constantly pushing in with your strong AI companion! By correctly allocating skills, perhaps the battle will go in your favor? In addition, the game supports local 2-player co-op! Exterminate the combat robots in turn with the help of your partner!
